full_text: Page 2836 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/07/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 129 130 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 808 810 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 408 409 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1238 1238 8:30- 9:00 AM 841 842 4:30-5:00 PM 440 441 1:00-1:30 AM 115 116 9:00-9:30 AM 914 917 5:00 -5:30 PM 506 507 1:30-2:00 AM 137 138 9:30-10:00 AM 948 949 5:30-6:00 PM 738 739 2:00-2:30 AM 206 207 10:00-10:30 AM 1020 1021 6:00-6:30 PM 610 611 2:30-3:00 AM 736 737 10:30-11:00 AM 1051 1052 6:30-7:00 PM 640 641 3:00-3:30 AM 308 309 11:00-11:30 AM 1123 1124 7:00-7:30 PM 710 711 3:30-4:00 AM 335 336 11:30-12:00 AM 1145 1146 7:30-8:00 PM 739 740 4:00-4:30 AM 440 441 12:00-12:30 PM 1229 1230 8:00-8:30 PM 808 809 4:30-5:00 AM 440 441 12:30- 1:00 PM 1231 1232 8:30- 9:00 PM 846 847 5:00 -5:30 AM 508 509 1:00-1:30 PM 126 127 9:00-9:30 PM 916 917 5:30-6:00 AM 654 655 1:30-2:00 PM 158 159 9:30-10:00 PM 940 941 6:00-6:30 AM 658 659 2:00-2:30 PM 218 219 10:00-10:30 PM 1010 1011 6:30-7:00 AM 638 639 2:30-3:00 PM 249 250 10:30-11:00 PM 1042 1043 7:00-7:30 AM 712 713 3:00-3:30 PM 321 322 11:00-11:30 PM 1112 1113 7:30-8:00 AM 740 741 3:30-4:00 PM 348 349 11:30-12:00 PM 1138 1140 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026492

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/07/2019

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in a table format, with some redacted information marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'. The document is a '30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET' for a specific tier and date.
